message.addMaterials: Add materials to your organisation by selecting them from the Open Material Library below. Material files can also be added by using the upload button.
message.updateMaterial_one: <bold>{{name}}</bold> will be updated to the latest version.
message.updateMaterial_other: {{count}} material INI files will be updated to the latest version.
message.unableToDelete_one: The selected material cannot be deleted as it is currently being used in templates. Please assign different materials to the following templates to continue with deletion:
message.unableToDelete_other: The selected materials cannot be deleted as they are currently being used in templates. Please assign different materials to the following templates to continue with deletion:
message.deleteMaterialWarning: Are you sure you want to delete the selected materials? Only the latest version of each material will be available to download again in the future.
message.noMaterials: Use the 'Add Materials' button at the top right of this page to add materials to your organisation
message.materialAlreadyAdded_one: {{name}} has already been added to your organisation.
message.materialAlreadyAdded_other: The following materials have already been added to your organisation:
message.materialNameConflict:
A material file named {{name}} already exists in your organisation.

You can replace the existing material, or keep both.
message.materialNameConflictDoForAll_one: Do this for {{count}} remaining naming conflict
message.materialNameConflictDoForAll_other: Do this for {{count}} remaining naming conflicts
message.materialNameConflictWithRevision:
A material file named {{name}}, Revision {{revision}} already exists in your organisation.

Do you want to replace the existing material with Revision {{requestedRevision}}?

tooltips.materials:
Lists all the materials that have been added to the Funnel.

Materials can be added from the Open Material library or uploaded manually.
